title: Zombie
description:
A reanimated human, often found in works of horror fiction. May have a female or male appearance.

May be used to refer to someone who appears listless, apathetic, or unresponsive to their surroundings.

May also be used to refer to a person who attempts to resume communications after previously ghosting out of a conversation.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the zombie emoji presents a distinctly ghastly figure with a pale, greenish complexion and vacant, glowing eyes.  Its tattered clothing and slightly slumped posture are depicted with a subtle 3D effect, suggesting an eerie, undead presence.  This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is often used humorously to represent feeling drained, overwhelmed, or metaphorically 'dead' after a long day.
